# snyk_organization (Resource)

Resource for configuring a Snyk Organization within your configured group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "snyk_organization" "example" {
  name = "Example Org"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String)

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
